attributes.value: Large oven safe dish for cook the Lasagna

Instructions:
Prepare the Meat Sauce:

In a large pot, cook the ground beef, Italian sausage, onion, and garlic over medium heat until well browned. Drain off any excess fat.
Stir in the tomato sauce, tomato paste, diced tomatoes, sugar, basil, salt, Italian seasoning, fennel seeds, and black pepper. Simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add the chopped parsley and mix well.
Prepare the Cheese Mixture:

In a medium bowl, combine the ricotta cheese, salt, egg, 3/4 cup Parmesan cheese, and chopped parsley. Mix until smooth and well combined.
Cook the Lasagna Noodles:

Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the lasagna noodles according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
Assemble the Lasagna:

Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
Spread a thin layer of the meat sauce on the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Place 3 lasagna noodles over the sauce. Spread 1/3 of the ricotta cheese mixture over the noodles. Top with 1/3 of the shredded mozzarella cheese. Spoon 1/3 of the meat sauce over the mozzarella.
Repeat the layers twice, ending with a final layer of meat sauce. Sprinkle the remaining Parmesan cheese over the top.
Bake:

Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes. Remove the foil and bake for an additional 25 minutes, or until the top is golden and the lasagna is bubbling.
Let the lasagna stand for 15 minutes before serving to allow it to set.

Oh everyone a'loves Luigi's Classico Lasagna!  You family gonna say "can I have a'more, of that Luigi's Classico Lasagna, ti prego"
To make it a'more e'special, look up on a'IPRS *Luigi's Secret Lasagna Pasta*
